name: Eliot's Revenge
description:
This game was made during a game jam for my school.

Thanks to:

April Monpart, Mélanie de Valeriola, Mahel Host, Jean-Bernard Gerond, Justin Geuquet.

In Eliot's Revenge you are a cockroach who was sucked by a vacuum robot. You will have to reach his heart to disable it et get you're revenge.
